name: Ecobound (JF Interactive)
description:
Released for Android! Releasing for PC soon.

Ecobound is an obstacle-filled platformer with the sole purpose to infuriate.

Features:

  • Progress through a range of levels, ranging from forests to savannas.
  • Unlock various minigames to give you a break from Adventure Mode, and earn extra coins and items
  • Customise your character with different accessories and colours
